title: "Reproducible Research (part 2)"

This week we will continue 

* learning about Rmarkdown, 
* installing and loading packages in R
* working through the Gapminder Example to set up Homework 1

We will also have a guest lecture from Dr. Michelle Wright, "NuRsing Reproducible Research into the 21st Century", on her experiences working with R and using reproducible research workflow principles working on a large research team. Her presentation also includes a humorous video on reproducible research, see [https://youtu.be/N2zK3sAtr-4](https://youtu.be/N2zK3sAtr-4).
